description: Creates a new application assessment for an application.

parameters.name: appArn
parameters.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Resilience Hub application. The format for this ARN is: arn: partition:resiliencehub: region: account:app/ app-id. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference guide.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: Used for an idempotency token. A client token is a unique, case-sensitive string of up to 64 ASCII characters. You should not reuse the same client token for other API requests. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Tags assigned to the resource. A tag is a label that you assign to an Amazon Web Services resource. Each tag consists of a key/value pair. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: assessment
nested_items.description: The assessment created.

nested_items.name: appArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Resilience Hub application. The format for this ARN is: arn: partition:resiliencehub: region: account:app/ app-id. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference guide.

nested_items.name: appVersion
nested_items.description: Version of an application.

nested_items.name: assessmentArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the assessment. The format for this ARN is: arn: partition:resiliencehub: region: account:app-assessment/ app-id. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference guide.

nested_items.name: assessmentName
nested_items.description: Name of the assessment.

nested_items.name: assessmentStatus
nested_items.description: Current status of the assessment for the resiliency policy.

nested_items.name: compliance
nested_items.description: Application compliance against the resiliency policy.

nested_items.name: achievableRpoInSecs
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: achievableRpoInSecs
nested_items.description: The Recovery Point Objective (RPO) that is achievable, in seconds.

nested_items.name: achievableRtoInSecs
nested_items.description: The Recovery Time Objective (RTO) that is achievable, in seconds.

nested_items.name: complianceStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of compliance for the resiliency policy.

nested_items.name: currentRpoInSecs
nested_items.description: The current RPO, in seconds.

nested_items.name: currentRtoInSecs
nested_items.description: The current RTO, in seconds.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The disruption compliance message.

nested_items.name: rpoDescription
nested_items.description: The RPO description.

nested_items.name: rpoReferenceId
nested_items.description: Reference identifier of the RPO .

nested_items.name: rtoDescription
nested_items.description: The RTO description.

nested_items.name: rtoReferenceId
nested_items.description: Reference identifier of the RTO.

nested_items.name: complianceStatus
nested_items.description: Current status of the compliance for the resiliency policy.

nested_items.name: amount
nested_items.description: The cost amount.

nested_items.name: currency
nested_items.description: The cost currency, for example USD.

nested_items.name: frequency
nested_items.description: The cost frequency.

nested_items.name: driftStatus
nested_items.description: Indicates if compliance drifts (deviations) were detected while running an assessment for your application.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: End time for the action.

nested_items.name: invoker
nested_items.description: The entity that invoked the assessment.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: Error or warning message from the assessment execution.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: Date and time when the resiliency policy was created.

nested_items.name: dataLocationConstraint
nested_items.description: Specifies a high-level geographical location constraint for where your resilience policy data can be stored.

nested_items.name: estimatedCostTier
nested_items.description: Specifies the estimated cost tier of the resiliency policy.

nested_items.name: rpoInSecs
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: rpoInSecs
nested_items.description: Recovery Point Objective (RPO) in seconds.

nested_items.name: rtoInSecs
nested_items.description: Recovery Time Objective (RTO) in seconds.

nested_items.name: policyArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resiliency policy. The format for this ARN is: arn: partition:resiliencehub: region: account:resiliency-policy/ policy-id. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference guide.

nested_items.name: policyDescription
nested_items.description: Description of the resiliency policy.

nested_items.name: policyName
nested_items.description: The name of the policy.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: tier
nested_items.description: The tier for this resiliency policy, ranging from the highest severity ( MissionCritical) to lowest ( NonCritical).

nested_items.name: resiliencyScore
nested_items.description: Current resiliency score for an application.

nested_items.name: componentScore
nested_items.description: The score generated by Resilience Hub for the scoring component after running an assessment.

nested_items.name: excludedCount
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: excludedCount
nested_items.description: Number of recommendations that were excluded from the assessment.

nested_items.name: outstandingCount
nested_items.description: Number of recommendations that must be implemented to obtain the maximum possible score for the scoring component. For SOPs, alarms, and tests, these are the number of recommendations that must be implemented. For compliance, these are the number of Application Components that have breached the resiliency policy.

nested_items.name: possibleScore
nested_items.description: Maximum possible score that can be obtained for the scoring component.

nested_items.name: score
nested_items.description: Resiliency score points given for the scoring component. The score is always less than or equal to the possibleScore.

nested_items.name: disruptionScore
nested_items.description: The disruption score for a valid key.
(string) ---
(float) ---

nested_items.name: score
nested_items.description: The outage score for a valid key.

nested_items.name: resourceErrorsDetails
nested_items.description: A resource error object containing a list of errors retrieving an application's resources.

nested_items.name: hasMoreErrors
nested_items.description: This indicates if there are more errors not listed in the resourceErrors list.

nested_items.name: resourceErrors
nested_items.description: A list of errors retrieving an application's resources.

nested_items.name: logicalResourceId
nested_items.description: Identifier of the logical resource.

nested_items.name: physicalResourceId
nested_items.description: Identifier of the physical resource.

nested_items.name: reason
nested_items.description: This is the error message.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: Starting time for the action.

nested_items.name: riskRecommendations
nested_items.description: Indicates the top risks and recommendations identified by the Resilience Hub assessment, each representing a specific risk and the corresponding recommendation to address it.

nested_items.name: appComponents
nested_items.description: Indicates the Application Components (AppComponents) that were assessed as part of the assessment and are associated with the identified risk and recommendation.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: recommendation
nested_items.description: Indicates the recommendation provided by the Resilience Hub to address the identified risks in the application.

nested_items.name: risk
nested_items.description: Indicates the description of the potential risk identified in the application as part of the Resilience Hub assessment.

nested_items.name: summary
nested_items.description: Indicates a concise summary that provides an overview of the Resilience Hub assessment.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: versionName
nested_items.description: Version name of the published application.
